website_summaries.verdict: Sure to be a hit with any Puppy Dog Pals fan, this adorable set features all 3 four-legged stars, including Hissy.
pros: Sized just right for little hands
Excellent quality, designed to withstand plenty of handling, cuddles, and kisses
We love the fact that Hissy wasn't overlooked
cons: Some owners wished they were slightly bigger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! Soft, great size, they stand upright(my son prefers stuffed animals that dont fall over), perfect quality!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Really Big and Soft Figures
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these. They are big soft and cuddly. Really great price for these 3 big figures. Love them. Looks even greater in person.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Dog Pals Trio is a HUGE hit
customer_reviews.text: These stuffed animals were a HUGE hit with my 4 year old. They’re a great size, very soft and cuddly and very nice quality. I was very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: These are as true to life as possibly could be. My 2 year old twin grandchildren simply adore them. We have only one problem... one twin is the owner of Roli and the other twin is parent to Bingo...they fight over Hissy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-Made, Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Puppy Dog Pals obsessed toddler for Christmas, and they are adorable! Very well-made, super soft, and looks exactly like the cartoon. She is 18 months old and has been playing with them every day and they have held up really well. Would definately recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Morris

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: So much better than what I thought they'd be! Super soft and almost real life size!! I love them and my 2 almost 3 year old is over the moon!!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine turner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 1 yr old
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 month old loves this cartoon. She turns 1 in June and can't wait to give these to her. These plushies are well made and alot bigger then I thought. Great gift idea !
customer_reviews.author: Samuel R. McClellan

customer_reviews.title: so soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Puppy Dog Pals and loves these soft stuffed animals!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Dozier

customer_reviews.title: ,I would buy them again
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong three for the price of one it’s just wonderful. My niece is a nephews really enjoy them. I would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Preston Riley

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: I love this plush toy its pretty big it's not the small one you would find in a store.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this there so great my son loves them and there his fav..!!
customer_reviews.author: L De Leon

customer_reviews.title: So cute my son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Thought they were a little bigger but that’s my fault very cute and my son loved them
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter’s favorite toys!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter plays with these 3 stuffed toys all the time. She just loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 2 yr old, loves them. There perfect n soft!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and well made
customer_reviews.text: These are super well made! My LO loves them 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Brandão

customer_reviews.title: Where are the other stuffys
customer_reviews.text: We did not receive bingo and rolly just hissy is there a reason for this?
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Bills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Puppy Dog Pal lovers
customer_reviews.text: My baby absolutely loves them. They are so cute and cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for a one year old to play with they were extremely soft and very durable. They are a great gift and great value
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Rentz

customer_reviews.title: They are going on a mission.
customer_reviews.text: My child loves these. Price wise I feel like Disney gouges.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: big
customer_reviews.text: the pair of dogs and one cat are large. Due to the size they are well worth the price paid. super cute
customer_reviews.author: DonnaMB

product_meta.title: Disney Store Bingo Rolly and Hissy Plush 8 1/2 - 12" H
product_meta.description: The fun-loving Rolly loves adventures with his brother Bingo, and lots of hugs. The irresistibly cute star of Disney Junior's new animated series Puppy Dog Pals would love to be friends with your own little pup. The fun-loving Bingo loves adventures with his brother Rolly, and lots of hugs. The irresistibly cute star of Disney Junior's new animated series Puppy Dog Pals would love to be friends with your own little pup. The purr-fectly adorable Hissy is fit for some kitty cuddles. The feline favorite from Disney Channel's new animated series Puppy Dog Pals makes a sweet lap cat as this soft huggable plush.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
